name: Pylons (u-ndefined)
description:
Pylons is a puzzle game about connecting wires. It is based on Nikoli's Hashiwokakero.

Create a wire by dragging a pylon to another pylon. Repeat to create two wires, and repeat again to remove the wires.

In later levels, you can use the scroll wheel to zoom in and out (please do it slowly). Right click to pan over the grid.

The rules for the puzzle are:

  1. Numbers above the pylon tell how many wires it is connected to.
  2. The wires never cross each other.
  3. The wires form a singular, connected path between all pylons.

Also playable in Fancade
